body: JuliArts membership offers you an exclusive opportunity to receive personalized drawings created just for you. To join, simply subscribe to our membership waitlist by providing your email address. Once you're on the waitlist, you'll have a reserved spot in our drawing queue.

header: What can I expect as a JuliArts member?
body: As a JuliArts member, you can expect a truly personalized art experience. Our skilled artist will create a custom drawing based on your photo or reference, bringing your vision to life. You'll receive high-quality artwork that showcases your unique personality and captures the essence of the subject.

header: How long is the typical wait time for a drawing?
body: The wait time for a drawing can vary depending on factors such as the current demand and the complexity of the artwork. While we strive to complete drawings as efficiently as possible, it's essential to maintain the quality and attention to detail that each piece deserves.

header: How do I submit my photo or reference for the drawing?
body: When your turn in the queue approaches, we'll provide detailed instructions on how to submit your photo or reference. Typically, we prefer whatsApp as it allows us to easily share your desired image.

header: What payment methods do you accept?
body: At JuliArts, we offer multiple payment options to cater to your convenience. As of now we only accept M-pesa. We are working to include additional online payment platforms such as PayPal.
